name: Short Sale Artisan
tag_list: shortsale, short-sale, preforeclosure, distressed-property, reo, bank-owned, realestate, real-estate, software, saas
overview:
Short Sale Artisan provides a web-based real-estate short sale transaction platform to agents and investors.

Short Sale Artisan helps investors and agents calculate and create offer letters to banks, HUD-1 forms, and numerous other documents. It also allows work flow and project organization and management, including task and contact management. Users are also able to connect with both hard and traditional lenders as well as search for new opportunities with a built-in aggregated search listing with Zillow integration.
